data.actual_result: The extension sends the image despite you having blocked the user
data.expected_result: It tells you that you cannot send messages to blocked users
data.short_description: You are able to send messages to users you've blocked using the Share Extension
data.steps_to_repro: - Block any user - Enter photos app - Click to share a random photo - Select Discord - Select to Share in Direct Messages to the user you blocked - Post
